title: Watch the Sci-Fi Channel Special instead
review: I had seen the 1hr special that spun the mythology about 'The Blair Witch' and was delightedly spooked.  The movie was not similar.  It's about a bunch of kids alone in the woods, and it is not scary at all.  It is novel in how realistically it comes across as if it were really a documentary, and the performances were realistic, but the overall feeling was dullness.

title: low expectations can yield high rewards
review: Assumed the film would be crap.  From the first moments, was sucked in.  It was tense and riveting, frightening, and took interesting perspectives on the human warrior-esque survival instinct.  As well, there were well-executed unexpected plot twists.  Pleasantly surprised
